title: Your Best Friend

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Introduce someone to the underground. You learn each other's role.
- Give someone some LOVE. You deal an attack to them.
- Attempt to steal a player's SOUL. This only works if you killed them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If any good faction player visits your target, you cannot give them LOVE.
- Stealing someone's SOUL gives you their ability and attributes, increases your attack and defense to Powerful, and changes your goal to "Kill everyone who would oppose you." Also, the above attribute no longer applies.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the Town lose.
